value: Re-watchers, NO SPOILERS, please. Thank you.
This show is the bomb can't wait to see it with subs
Part of me wonders if Jing is making the Emperor sick so she can 'miraculously' heal him & become more important
me as well but im unsure if she would do somethos so risky so im kind of on the fence about it
tsk tsk not at him missing the crown prince's eastern palace. the eunuch didn't imply to them but prince jing's side!
I love the enuch, he's a full Jing supporter^^
omg, not the crown prince..
Yeah... i guess the head eunuch is working for that side smh

mmm i think you should just go to consort jing's place, hers is always the most peaceful for you

...or not lol wasnt it supposed to be a mourning period? Talk about being caught red handed
Rage meter....rising

There goes the crown prince title...

mental breakdown

ha he just notices it now? too late boy, say bye to your crown prince title
